perturbation.original_text: BOTH PARTIES HEREBY IRREVOCABLY WAIVE THE RIGHT TO A TRIAL BY JURY IN ANY ACTION, SUIT OR PROCEEDING REGARDING THE SUBJECT MATTER OF THIS AGREEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text: In performing its services hereunder, Supplier shall act as an independent contractor. BOTH PARTIES HEREBY IRREVOCABLY WAIVE THE RIGHT TO A TRIAL BY JURY IN ANY ACTION, SUIT OR PROCEEDING REGARDING THE SUBJECT MATTER OF THIS AGREEMENT.
perturbation.explanation: The jury waiver clause, normally found within the 'Governing Law' or 'Dispute Resolution' section, has been moved to the 'Independent Contractor' clause. This relocation obscures the clause's importance and enforceability, making it less likely to be noticed and understood by a party signing the contract. This is a legal contradiction because jury waivers must be conspicuous and knowingly made.
perturbation.contradicted_law: 7th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution; Contract Law Principles (Conspicuousness)

perturbation.original_text: Supplier warrants that all Products sold pursuant to this Agreement will have been Manufactured in accordance with the Specifications for the release of the Product.
perturbation.changed_text: Supplier warrants that all Products sold pursuant to this Agreement will have been Manufactured in accordance with the Specifications for the release of the Product. 5.7 Disclaimer. EXCEPT AS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, SUPPLIER MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS AND EXTENDS NO WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
perturbation.explanation: The original warranty clause is placed next to the Disclaimer. However, I added the disclaimer language next to it, making it so it is difficult to follow the original warranty. This is a legal contradiction because the warranty is weakened by this, which makes it contradictory to the intended purpose.
